text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 32px; font-weight: 700; white-space: pre;

tspan.style: fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-decoration: underline solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
fill: rgb(197, 0, 0); paint-order: fill; text-decoration: underline solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
